text: Craig Haydn Roberts (born 21 January 1991) is a Welsh actor, writer and director. He is best known for his lead roles as Oliver Tate in the coming-of- age comedy-drama movie Submarine (2010), David Meyers in the series Red Oaks (2014–2017), and for playing Rio Wellard in the television series The Story of Tracy Beaker (2004–2005). ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors Category:Welsh writers Category:Welsh movie actors Category:Welsh television actors Category:Welsh stage actors Category:Welsh voice actors Category:People from Newport
title: Craig Roberts
